data.introduce: 本接口实现了国内/国际手工退票（订单）功能。
data.business:
本接口支持手工填写退票单、提交退票单，获取退票单号，完成手工退票。
提交退票单的同时修改国内票票面状态为refunded，国际票不支持提退同时修改票面状态，需使用E71-修改票面状态（订单）接口进行修改。
请注意，如国内票区分两次退票，第一次指定航段退票会自动修改票面状态为refunded，第二次退票后需使用E71-修改票面状态（订单）接口进行修改。
data.functions:
手工退票，对应黑屏指令：
TRFD:AM/打票机号/打票机类型
支持旅客类型：支持成人、儿童、婴儿；
国内手工退票支持指定航段作退，一个退票单只允许退一张票，联票需多次作退。如下场景需在请求中传入退票单号RefundFormNumber：国内票一张票有两个航段，第一次指定航段退票生成退票单号A，第二次指定另一个航段退票，需在请求中传入退票单号A完成退票；
国际手工退票不支持指定航段作退，支持退票面所有未飞航段（包括联票），联票写在一个退票单上。
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TES_AirTicketManualRefundOrderRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"手工退票（订单）请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"0..2","default":"","description":"订单和PNR信息：订单号必传，PNR非必传","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"订单号或PNR","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"订单号或PNR标识：ID_Context为PNR时，ID是PNR号； ID_Context为ORDER时，ID是订单号。","children":[]}]},{"name":"TRFDResult","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"RefundForm","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"RefundFormNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"针对国内票指定航段退票场景，需在第二次指定航段退票时传入第一次指定航段退票生成的退票单号RefundFormNumber","children":[]},{"name":"RefundFormInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"AirlineCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司三位客票代号：例如：999","children":[]},{"name":"DeviceID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机号","children":[]},{"name":"TicketType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"客票类型：I为国际航班，D为国内航班","children":[]},{"name":"RefundType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"退票类型：
N--Normal，普通退票
F--Face to face，面对面信用卡退票","children":[]},{"name":"Refund","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否修改状态(填写Y或N)","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名：填写拼音或英文","children":[]},{"name":"EnglishName","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"英文旅客姓名","children":[{"name":"FirstName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"姓","children":[]},{"name":"LastName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"名","children":[]}]},{"name":"ChineseName","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"中文旅客姓名","children":[{"name":"FirstName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"姓","children":[]},{"name":"LastName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"名","children":[]}]},{"name":"TktItemInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号范围","children":[{"name":"TktNoStart","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号范围的开始票号：除了航司的三位客票代号，剩下的10位票号","children":[]},{"name":"TktNoEnd","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号范围的结束票号：7位票号","children":[]}]},{"name":"ConjunctionNo","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"连续票号数量","children":[]},{"name":"Coupons","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Coupon","type":"array","quantity":"0..4","default":"","description":"票证信息：最多4个","children":[{"name":"@CouponNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票证航段编号（最多4个)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Commission","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"代理费信息","children":[{"name":"CommissionAmount","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"代理费","children":[]},{"name":"CommissionRate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"代理费率","children":[]},{"name":"CommissionMode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"退票代理费模式：填写0 或 1 .默认0","children":[]}]},{"name":"PaymentInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"付款信息","children":[{"name":"PaymentForm","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付类型：(FOP)
* 混合支付时，退款方式支持如下四种:CA-CASH CK-CHECK CQ-CHEQUE CC-CREDITCARD
* 非混合支付时，支持如下支付方式:CASH-现金 CHECK-支票 CHEQUE--支票，
* 主机不支持此类型 CC--信用卡 TC-信用卡，政府采购票必须填TC，GR SGR EF
* 注:面对面信用卡退票，必须填CC/TC","children":[]},{"name":"CreditCard","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"信用卡号","children":[]},{"name":"CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币类型：例如：CNY","children":[]},{"name":"CurrencyPrecision","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"货币精度","children":[]},{"name":"CreditVendorCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"用卡供应商授权的源代码","children":[]},{"name":"BankSequenceNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"银行流水号","children":[]},{"name":"Amount","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"退款金额","children":[]},{"name":"@MultiPaymentsInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"混合支付标识：true:混合支付（MFOP） false:非混合支付","children":[]}]},{"name":"RMKS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"RMK","type":"array","quantity":"0..2","default":"","description":"备注 长度为2 第一条表示：备注类型 IC-大客户卡号，WV-豁免 第二条表示：备注内容","children":[]}]},{"name":"RefundFeeInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"退款信息","children":[{"name":"GrossRefund","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"毛退款额","children":[]},{"name":"NetRefund","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"净退款额","children":[]},{"name":"OtherDeduction","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"扣款","children":[]},{"name":"AirlineRefund","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航司退票金额，AR税","children":[]},{"name":"TAXS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"TAX","type":"array","quantity":"0..27","default":"","description":"税款信息：最多27项","children":[{"name":"XFTAX","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@XFCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"XF税城市三字码","children":[]},{"name":"@XFAmount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"XF税金额","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TaxCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税代码","children":[]},{"name":"@TaxAmount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税款金额","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@AutoRefundType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"自动退票标识","children":[]},{"name":"@InvoluntaryServiceInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"非自愿标识：false-自愿，true-非自愿","children":[]}]}]}]}]},{"name":"@TicketType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"五类票客票类型","children":[]}]}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirTicketManualRefundOrderRQ>
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS191"/>
    </POS>
    <BookingReferenceID ID="ZM3YN3" ID_Context="PNR"/>
    <BookingReferenceID ID="2404231420040fcc857" ID_Context="ORDER"/>
    <TRFDResult>
        <RefundForm>
            <RefundFormInfo>
                <AirlineCode>999</AirlineCode>
                <DeviceID>53</DeviceID>
                <TicketType>D</TicketType>
                <Refund>Y</Refund>
                <PassengerName>TEST/ADT</PassengerName>
                <TktItemInfo>
                    <TktNoStart>6923957391</TktNoStart>
                    <TktNoEnd>957391</TktNoEnd>
                </TktItemInfo>
                <ConjunctionNo>1</ConjunctionNo>
                <Coupons>
                    <Coupon CouponNo="1000"/>
                </Coupons>
                <Commission>
                    <CommissionAmount>45.0</CommissionAmount>
                </Commission>
                <PaymentInfo>
                    <PaymentForm>CASH</PaymentForm>
                    <CurrencyCode>CNY</CurrencyCode>
                </PaymentInfo>
                <RMKS/>
                <RefundFeeInfo>
                    <GrossRefund>1490.0</GrossRefund>
                    <NetRefund>1490.0</NetRefund>
                    <OtherDeduction>0.0</OtherDeduction>
                    <TAXS>
                        <TAX TaxCode="CN" TaxAmount="50.0">
                        </TAX>
                        <TAX TaxCode="YQ" TaxAmount="0.0">
                        </TAX>
                    </TAXS>
                </RefundFeeInfo>
            </RefundFormInfo>
        </RefundForm>
    </TRFDResult>
</TES_AirTicketManualRefundOrderRQ>

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: BOP手工退票-包含所有节点
qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirTicketManualRefundOrderRQ TicketType="BOP">
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="PEK298"/>
    </POS>
    <BookingReferenceID ID="ZM3YN3" ID_Context="PNR"/>
    <BookingReferenceID ID="2404231420040fcc857" ID_Context="ORDER"/>
    <TRFDResult>
        <RefundForm>
            <RefundFormInfo>
                <AirlineCode>297</AirlineCode>
                <DeviceID>1</DeviceID>
                <TicketType>I</TicketType>
                <Refund>Y</Refund>
                <RefundType>N</RefundType>
                <PassengerName>zhou/xiao</PassengerName>
                <EnglishName>
                    <FirstName>xiao</FirstName>
                    <LastName>zhou</LastName>
                </EnglishName>
                <ChineseName></ChineseName>
                <TktItemInfo>
                    <TktNoStart>2495033250</TktNoStart>
                    <TktNoEnd>5033251</TktNoEnd>
                </TktItemInfo>
                <ConjunctionNo>1</ConjunctionNo>
                <Coupons>
                    <Coupon CouponNo="1000"/>
                    <Coupon CouponNo="0000"/>
                </Coupons>
                <Commission>
                    <CommissionAmount>5.0</CommissionAmount>
                    <CommissionRate>0.0</CommissionRate>
                    <CommissionMode></CommissionMode>
                </Commission>
                <PaymentInfo MultiPaymentsInd="false">
                    <PaymentForm>TC</PaymentForm>
                    <CreditCard>TP192000088949282</CreditCard>
                    <CurrencyCode>CNY</CurrencyCode>
                    <CurrencyPrecision></CurrencyPrecision>
                    <CreditVendorCode>TEST</CreditVendorCode>
                    <BankSequenceNumber>TEST</BankSequenceNumber>
                    <Amount></Amount>
                </PaymentInfo>
                <RMKS>
                    <RMK>TEST</RMK>
                    <RMK>test</RMK>
                </RMKS>
                <RefundFeeInfo AutoRefundType="TEST" InvoluntaryServiceInd="">
                    <GrossRefund>2150.0</GrossRefund>
                    <NetRefund>2265.0</NetRefund>
                    <OtherDeduction>0.0</OtherDeduction>
                    <AirlineRefund>0.0</AirlineRefund>
                    <TAXS>
                        <TAX TaxCode="CN" TaxAmount="50.0">
                        </TAX>
                        <TAX TaxCode="YQ" TaxAmount="70.0">
                        </TAX>
                    </TAXS>
                </RefundFeeInfo>
            </RefundFormInfo>
        </RefundForm>
    </TRFDResult>
</TES_AirTicketManualRefundOrderRQ>
